headline: WEST-BOND ULTRASONIC WEDGE WIRE BONDER
description: Ultrasonic Wedge Wire Bonder     Designed to interconnect wire leads to semi-conductor, hybrid or microwave devices. Machine bonds insulated wire directly to thin film gold without the need to strip off insulation   Representative photo
keywords: wire bonders  bonder  wedge bonder  wire bonder
specstable:
Manufacturer West-Bond
Model 7440A (formerly 7400IW)
Description Ultrasonic Wedge Wire Bonder
Accessories

Compatible Stereo Zoom Microscope

Other Information

Built in ultrasonic transducer
Al or Au wires ranging from 0.0007 in. to 0.002 in.

Wire feed mechanism is omitted (by design), as wire is positioned manually by the operator.

Five units available at 220 Volts input
